00012 SACMethodMLESAC::SACMethodMLESAC() {
00013         //Default value used
00014         this->iterationsEM = 3;

00019 bool SACMethodMLESAC::computeModel(){
00020         // Warn and exit if no threshold was set
00021         if (this->threshold == -1)
00022         {
00023                 cout<<"[MLESAC::computeModel] No threshold set!"<<endl;
00024                 return (false);
00025         }
00026 
00027         this->iterations = 0;
00028         double bestDistancePenaltyFound = DBL_MAX;
00029         double k = 1.0;
00030 
00031         std::vector<int> bestModelIndices;
00032         Eigen::VectorXd estimatedModelCoefficients;
00033         std::vector<double> distances;
00034 
00035         // Compute sigma - remember to set threshold_ correctly !
00036         sigma_ = computeMedianAbsoluteDeviation (this->objectModel->getInputCloud (), this->threshold);
00037         cout<<"[MLESAC::computeModel] Estimated sigma value: "<< sigma_<<endl;
00038 
00039         // Compute the bounding box diagonal: V = sqrt (sum (max(pointCloud) - min(pointCloud)^2))
00040         Eigen::Vector4d minPt, maxPt;
00041         getMinMax (this->objectModel->getInputCloud (), minPt, maxPt);
00042         maxPt -= minPt;
00043         double v = sqrt (maxPt.dot (maxPt));
00044 
00045         int noInliersCurrentModel = 0;
00046         size_t indicesSize;
00047         // Iterate
00048         while (this->iterations < k)
00049         {
00050                //Compute a random model from the input pointcloud
00051                bool isDegenerate = false;
00052                bool modelFound = false;
00053 
00054                this->objectModel->computeRandomModel(this->iterations,estimatedModelCoefficients,isDegenerate,modelFound);
00055 
00056                if (!isDegenerate) break;
00057 
00058                if(!modelFound){
00059                    this->iterations++;
00060                    continue;
00061                }
00062 
00063                 // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the model
00064                 this->objectModel->getDistancesToModel (estimatedModelCoefficients, distances);
00065 
00066                 // Use Expectiation-Maximization to find out the right value for d_cur_penalty
00067                 // ---[ Initial estimate for the gamma mixing parameter = 1/2
00068                 double gamma = 0.5;
00069                 double outlierProbability = 0;
00070 
00071                 indicesSize = this->objectModel->getInputCloud()->getSize();
00072                 std::vector<double> inlierProbability (indicesSize);
00073                 for (int j = 0; j < iterationsEM; ++j)
00074                 {
00075                         // Likelihood of a datum given that it is an inlier
00076                         for (size_t i = 0; i < indicesSize; ++i)
00077                                 inlierProbability[i] = gamma * exp (- (distances[i] * distances[i] ) / 2 * (sigma_ * sigma_) ) /
00078                                 (sqrt (2 * M_PI) * sigma_);
00079 
00080                         // Likelihood of a datum given that it is an outlier
00081                         outlierProbability = (1 - gamma) / v;
00082 
00083                         gamma = 0;
00084                         for (size_t i = 0; i < indicesSize; ++i)
00085                                 gamma += inlierProbability [i] / (inlierProbability[i] + outlierProbability);
00086                         gamma /= this->objectModel->getInputCloud()->getSize();
00087                 }
00088 
00089                 // Find the log likelihood of the model -L = -sum [log (pInlierProb + pOutlierProb)]
00090                 double currentPenalty = 0;
00091                 for (size_t i = 0; i < indicesSize; ++i)
00092                         currentPenalty += log (inlierProbability[i] + outlierProbability);
00093                 currentPenalty = - currentPenalty;
00094 
00095                 // Better match ?
00096                 if (currentPenalty < bestDistancePenaltyFound)
00097                 {
00098                         bestDistancePenaltyFound = currentPenalty;
00099 
00100                         // Save the current model/coefficients selection as being the best so far
00101                         this->modelCoefficients = estimatedModelCoefficients;
00102 
00103                         noInliersCurrentModel = 0;
00104                         // Need to compute the number of inliers for this model to adapt k
00105                         for (size_t i = 0; i < distances.size (); ++i)
00106                                 if (distances[i] <= 2 * sigma_)
00107                                         noInliersCurrentModel++;
00108 
00109                         // Compute the k parameter (k=log(z)/log(1-w^n))
00110                         double w = (double)((double)noInliersCurrentModel / (double)this->objectModel->getInputCloud()->getSize());
00111                         double pNoOutliers = 1 - pow (w, (double)this->objectModel->getNumberOfSamplesRequired());
00112                         pNoOutliers = std::max (std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon (), pNoOutliers);       // Avoid division by -Inf
00113                         pNoOutliers = std::min (1 - std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon (), pNoOutliers);   // Avoid division by 0.
00114                         k = log (1 - this->probability) / log (pNoOutliers);
00115                 }
00116 
00117                 this->iterations++;
00118 
00119                 if (this->iterations > this->maxIterations)
00120                 {
00121                         cout<<"[MLESAC::computeModel] MLESAC reached the maximum number of trials"<<endl;
00122                         break;
00123                 }
00124         }
00125 
00126         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the model again
00127         this->objectModel->getDistancesToModel (this->modelCoefficients, distances);
00128 
00129         this->inliers.resize (distances.size ());
00130         // Get the inliers for the best model found
00131         noInliersCurrentModel = 0;
00132         for (size_t i = 0; i < distances.size (); ++i)
00133                 if (distances[i] <= 2 * sigma_)
00134                         this->inliers[noInliersCurrentModel++] = i;
00135 
00136         // Resize the inliers vector
00137         this->inliers.resize (noInliersCurrentModel);
00138 
00139         if (this->inliers.size () == 0)
00140         {
00141                 cout<<"[MLESAC::computeModel] Unable to find a solution!"<<endl;
00142                 return (false);
00143         }
00144         return (true);
00145 
00146 }
00147 
00148 void SACMethodMLESAC::computeMedian (PointCloud3D *cloud, Eigen::Vector4f &median){
00149         // Copy the values to vectors for faster sorting
00150         std::vector<Coordinate> x(cloud->getSize());
00151         std::vector<Coordinate> y(cloud->getSize());
00152         std::vector<Coordinate> z(cloud->getSize());
00153 
00154 //      std::vector<Point3D> *points;
00155 //      points= cloud->getPointCloud();
00156 
00157         for (size_t i = 0; i < cloud->getSize(); ++i)
00158         {
00159                 x[i] = (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX();
00160                 y[i] = (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY();;
00161                 z[i] = (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ();;
00162         }
00163 
00164         std::sort (x.begin (), x.end ());
00165         std::sort (y.begin (), y.end ());
00166         std::sort (z.begin (), z.end ());
00167 
00168         int mid = cloud->getSize () / 2;
00169         if (cloud->getSize () % 2 == 0)
00170         {
00171                 median[0] = (x[mid-1] + x[mid]) / 2;
00172                 median[1] = (y[mid-1] + y[mid]) / 2;
00173                 median[2] = (z[mid-1] + z[mid]) / 2;
00174         }
00175         else
00176         {
00177                 median[0] = x[mid];
00178                 median[1] = y[mid];
00179                 median[2] = z[mid];
00180         }
00181         median[3] = 0;
00182 }

00184 double SACMethodMLESAC::computeMedianAbsoluteDeviation (PointCloud3D *cloud,double sigma) {
00185 
00186         std::vector<double> distances (cloud->getSize());
00187 
00188         Eigen::Vector4f median;
00189         // median (dist (x - median (x)))
00190         computeMedian (cloud, median);
00191 
00192 //      std::vector<Point3D> *points = cloud->getPointCloud();
00193 
00194         Eigen::Vector4f pt, ptdiff;
00195         {
00196                 for (size_t i = 0; i < cloud->getSize(); ++i)
00197                 {
00198                         pt = Eigen::Vector4f ((*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX(), (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY(), (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ(), 0);
00199                         pt -= median;
00200                         distances[i] = pt.dot (pt);
00201                 }
00202         }
00203 
00204         std::sort (distances.begin (), distances.end ());
00205 
00206         double result;
00207         int mid = cloud->getSize() / 2;
00208         // Do we have a "middle" point or should we "estimate" one ?
00209         if (cloud->getSize() % 2 == 0)
00210                 result = (sqrt (distances[mid-1]) + sqrt (distances[mid])) / 2;
00211         else
00212                 result = sqrt (distances[mid]);
00213         return (sigma * result);
00214 }
00215 
00216 void SACMethodMLESAC::getMinMax (PointCloud3D *cloud, Eigen::Vector4d &minP, Eigen::Vector4d &maxP){
00217         minP.setConstant (DBL_MAX);
00218         maxP.setConstant (-DBL_MAX);
00219         minP[3] = maxP[3] = 0;
00220 
00221 //      std::vector<Point3D> *points = cloud->getPointCloud();
00222 
00223         for (size_t i = 0; i < cloud->getSize(); ++i)
00224         {
00225                 if ((*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX() < minP[0]) minP[0] = (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX();
00226                 if ((*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY() < minP[1]) minP[1] = (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY();
00227                 if ((*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ() < minP[2]) minP[2] = (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ();
00228 
00229                 if ((*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX() > maxP[0]) maxP[0] = (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX();
00230                 if ((*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY() > maxP[1]) maxP[1] = (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY();
00231                 if ((*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ() > maxP[2]) maxP[2] = (*cloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ();
00232         }
00233 
00234 }
